snippet: The construction site at 560 West 24th Street, a boutique condominium in West Chelsea near the High Line, was one worker’s personal canvas.
abstract: Aspiring immigrant artist Pajtim Osmanaj transforms his construction job by making art using the building's walls and raw materials in his free time; though work was mostly removed or covered, his efforts impress developers and open doors to Chelsea art scene.
lead_paragraph: The construction site at 560 West 24th Street, a boutique condominium in West Chelsea near the High Line, was one worker’s personal canvas.

headline.main: Art Hidden Behind a Condo’s Walls
